mapper.select: select EP_ID AS epId, CERT_SEQ AS certSeq, CERT_ID AS certId, CERT_NAME AS certName from SL_EP_CERT where EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND DEL_FLG=#{filterMap.delFlg}
select A.SELF_FLG AS selfFlg, A.AGENT_FLG AS agentFlg, A.OEM_FLG AS oemFlg, A.SL_MAIN_CLASS AS slMainClass from SL_SELLER AS A where A.EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND A.DEL_FLG = 0 limit 0,1

select EP_ID AS epId, CERT_SEQ AS certSeq, CERT_ITEM_SEQ AS certItemSeq, CERT_ID AS certId, CERT_ITEM_ID AS certItemId, CERT_ITEM_NAME AS certItemName, CERT_ITEM_VALUE AS certItemValue from SL_EP_CERT_ITEM where CERT_ID=#{filterMap.certId} AND EP_ID=#{filterMap.epId} AND DEL_FLG=#{filterMap.delFlg}
